lom:description.lom:string: This book is about female engineering faculty. It takes a look at statistics describing the female faculty in U.S. colleges, including information about demographics, education, and employment. Several tables and figures are provided to summarize the backgrounds of the female engineering faculty. This book can be found online as well as in print.

lom:title.lom:string: Female Engineering Faculty at U.S. Institutions: A Data Profile
